file_content.text: [The console is offline.]
[You override the security controls and disable the ray shield blocking the exit.]
[The cryogenics tanks in this lab preserve the Sith purebloods that Darth Ikoral has collected over the past seventy years.]
[This console can issue commands to wake the potentially violent Sith from hibernation. Alternatively, it can terminate life support.]
[You disengage the cryogenics systems, releasing the pureblood Sith.]
[Release the Sith]
[You overload the life support systems, terminating the pureblood Sith inside the cryogenics tanks.]
[Terminate life support]
[You leave the console, avoiding a potential confrontation.]
[Leave the console]
[You override the security controls and disable the ray shield blocking the exit.]
[The cryogenics tanks in this lab preserve the Sith purebloods that Darth Ikoral has collected over the past seventy years.]
[This console can issue commands to wake the potentially violent Sith from hibernation. Alternatively, it can terminate life support.]
[You disengage the cryogenics systems, releasing the pureblood Sith.]
[Release the Sith]
[You overload the life support systems, terminating the pureblood Sith inside the cryogenics tanks.]
[Terminate life support]
[You leave the console, avoiding a potential confrontation.]
[Leave the console]
[The console is offline.]
